title: Track Awesome Programming for Kids Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Programming for Kids (HollyAdele/awesome-programming-for-kids) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of resources for teaching kids programming.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Nov 11 - Nov 17, 2024
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Nov 11 - Nov 17, 2024
items.content_text:
### Upper Elementary

*   [CodeKidz](https://codekidz.ai/) - Learn through AI tutor and gamified content, including python, javascript, c/c++, game development, machine learning, generative ai, and more.
items.content_html:
Upper Elementary

  • CodeKidz - Learn through AI tutor and gamified content, including python, javascript, c/c++, game development, machine learning, generative ai, and more.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Nov 29 - Dec 05, 2021
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Nov 29 - Dec 05, 2021
items.content_text:
### Pre-Literate

*   [Code-a-pillar](https://www.fisher-price.com/en-us/product/think-learn-code-a-pillar-twist-gfp25) - A walking and singing catapiller toy that can be programmed by connecting a series of segments that give instructions.

### Upper Elementary

*   [Sphereo](https://sphero.com/products/mini-at-home-learning-kit) - A spherical robot that can be programmed with a block-programming language in a companion app.
items.content_html:
Pre-Literate

  • Code-a-pillar - A walking and singing catapiller toy that can be programmed by connecting a series of segments that give instructions.

Upper Elementary

  • Sphereo - A spherical robot that can be programmed with a block-programming language in a companion app.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Jun 21 - Jun 27, 2021
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jun 21 - Jun 27, 2021
items.content_text:
### Lower Elementary

*   [Lightbot](https://lightbot.com/) - Solve puzzles with commands, loops, and conditionals. Comes in Lightbot and lightbot Jr, and a mobile app or a desktop website.
*   [Code Monkey](https://app.codemonkey.com/users/sign_up/student/age) - more graphics to learn Python type of code. ( Not-free for advanced levels )
items.content_html:
Lower Elementary

  • Lightbot - Solve puzzles with commands, loops, and conditionals. Comes in Lightbot and lightbot Jr, and a mobile app or a desktop website.
  • Code Monkey - more graphics to learn Python type of code. ( Not-free for advanced levels )

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Mar 22 - Mar 28, 2021
items.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Mar 22 - Mar 28, 2021
items.content_text:
### Lower Elementary

*   [Hopscotch](https://www.gethopscotch.com/) - Hopscotch is a code block editor like Scratch, but in an iOS app. Can program code to react to tipping and shaking the device.
*   [Evo from Ozobot](https://ozoblockly.com/editor?lang=en\&robot=evo\&mode=2) - Evo is a tiny robot that can move, light up, and make sounds. Also it detects what color it is driving on. It can follow commands based on the color of the line it is following. Or, it can be programmed using a code block editor like Scratch. Hold the robot up to a flashing dot on the screen, and the website will load the program onto the robot with light flashes.

### Upper Elementary

*   [tinkercad.com](https://www.tinkercad.com/things?type=codeblocks\&view_mode=default) - TinkerCAD is a free, 3D CAD modeling software program for children. Users can also manipulate the shapes using code blocks like Scratch.
*   [Code Combat](https://codecombat.com/) - Code a hero to compete heroic tasks using Javascript or Python. The hero gets new weapons or skills whenever the user learns a new method.
items.content_html:
Lower Elementary

  • Hopscotch - Hopscotch is a code block editor like Scratch, but in an iOS app. Can program code to react to tipping and shaking the device.
  • Evo from Ozobot - Evo is a tiny robot that can move, light up, and make sounds. Also it detects what color it is driving on. It can follow commands based on the color of the line it is following. Or, it can be programmed using a code block editor like Scratch. Hold the robot up to a flashing dot on the screen, and the website will load the program onto the robot with light flashes.

Upper Elementary

  • tinkercad.com - TinkerCAD is a free, 3D CAD modeling software program for children. Users can also manipulate the shapes using code blocks like Scratch.
  • Code Combat - Code a hero to compete heroic tasks using Javascript or Python. The hero gets new weapons or skills whenever the user learns a new method.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2020
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2020
items.content_text:
### Upper Elementary

*   [Swift Playgrounds](http://www.apple.com/swift/playgrounds/) - Apple's fun iPad app for learning Swift.
*   [Microsoft MakeCode](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/makecode) - A suite of educational tools for kids, including online environments for game development, minecraft modding, hardware hacking, and more.
items.content_html:
Upper Elementary

  • Swift Playgrounds - Apple's fun iPad app for learning Swift.
  • Microsoft MakeCode - A suite of educational tools for kids, including online environments for game development, minecraft modding, hardware hacking, and more.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Oct 28 - Nov 03, 2019
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Oct 28 - Nov 03, 2019
items.content_text:
### Pre-Literate

*   [The Foos](https://itunes.apple.com/app/id923441570) - A funny, pre-literate iPad game that teaches concepts for commands, parameters, loops, and conditionals.

### Lower Elementary

*   [Cargo Bot](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cargo-bot/id519690804?mt=8) - iPad app to solve problems with constraints using commands, loops, conditional statements. More difficult puzzles than Lightbot.

### Upper Elementary

*   [Web Design for Kids](https://webdesign.tutsplus.com/series/web-design-for-kids--cms-823) - A series of tutorials teaching children the basics of designing and building a website with HTML and CSS.
*   [Secret Coders](http://www.secret-coders.com/buy-the-books/) - A engaging book series that teaches programming concepts through Logo.
*   [Khan Academy - Computer Programming](https://www.khanacademy.org/computing/computer-programming) - A series of web-based programming lessons with interactive challenges, by Khan Academy. Teaches topics like animation, game development, and web programming.  Users can post questions, which get answered quickly by the community.
items.content_html:
Pre-Literate

  • The Foos - A funny, pre-literate iPad game that teaches concepts for commands, parameters, loops, and conditionals.

Lower Elementary

  • Cargo Bot - iPad app to solve problems with constraints using commands, loops, conditional statements. More difficult puzzles than Lightbot.

Upper Elementary

  • Web Design for Kids - A series of tutorials teaching children the basics of designing and building a website with HTML and CSS.
  • Secret Coders - A engaging book series that teaches programming concepts through Logo.
  • Khan Academy - Computer Programming - A series of web-based programming lessons with interactive challenges, by Khan Academy. Teaches topics like animation, game development, and web programming. Users can post questions, which get answered quickly by the community.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Oct 22 - Oct 28, 2018
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Oct 22 - Oct 28, 2018
items.content_text:
### Lower Elementary

*   [Code Master](https://www.thinkfun.com/products/code-master/) - An addictive board game that builds problem solving skills and understanding of programming logic. Starts basic and moves to very advanced.
items.content_html:
Lower Elementary

  • Code Master - An addictive board game that builds problem solving skills and understanding of programming logic. Starts basic and moves to very advanced.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Aug 22 - Aug 28, 2016
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Aug 22 - Aug 28, 2016
items.content_text:
### Upper Elementary

*   [DIY.org](https://diy.org/skills) - An online community for kids to learn anything.  Programming skills listed are App Dev, Backend Dev, Frontend Dev, Game Dev, Graphic Designer, Open Sourcerer, Scratcher, Sys Admin, and Web Designer.
*   [CS Unplugged](http://csunplugged.org/) - A collection of free learning activities that teach Computer Science through engaging games and puzzles that use cards, string, crayons and lots of running around.
items.content_html:
Upper Elementary

  • DIY.org - An online community for kids to learn anything. Programming skills listed are App Dev, Backend Dev, Frontend Dev, Game Dev, Graphic Designer, Open Sourcerer, Scratcher, Sys Admin, and Web Designer.
  • CS Unplugged - A collection of free learning activities that teach Computer Science through engaging games and puzzles that use cards, string, crayons and lots of running around.

items.title: Awesome Programming for Kids Updates on Aug 15 - Aug 21, 2016
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Aug 15 - Aug 21, 2016
items.content_text:
### Pre-Literate

*   [Scratch Jr.](https://www.scratchjr.org/) - An app that teaches young kids how to visually code interactive stories and games. A simplified version of the Scratch website, for a tablet.

### Lower Elementary

*   [Scratch](https://scratch.mit.edu/) - Scratch is a popular visual programming language for beginners, created by MIT. The Scratch website is a platform for kids to make interactive stories and share them with each other.
*   [Code.org](https://studio.code.org/) - A website with interactive coding games and courses for kids. Covers a large range of ages and skill levels.

### Upper Elementary

*   [Lauren Ipsum](http://laurenipsum.org/) - A book that teaches problem-solving concepts in the context of programming.  Sample chapters available online.
*   [Ruby Warrior](https://www.bloc.io/ruby-warrior#/) - An online tutorial-game with cool music that teaches Ruby programming.
items.content_html:
Pre-Literate

  • Scratch Jr. - An app that teaches young kids how to visually code interactive stories and games. A simplified version of the Scratch website, for a tablet.

Lower Elementary

  • Scratch - Scratch is a popular visual programming language for beginners, created by MIT. The Scratch website is a platform for kids to make interactive stories and share them with each other.
  • Code.org - A website with interactive coding games and courses for kids. Covers a large range of ages and skill levels.

Upper Elementary

  • Lauren Ipsum - A book that teaches problem-solving concepts in the context of programming. Sample chapters available online.
  • Ruby Warrior - An online tutorial-game with cool music that teaches Ruby programming.
